title: Murray (Rev. P.)
body: English ecclesiastic who botanized in Madeira in 1894 and also visited Portugal and the Canaries. He died on October 29, 1908, and his herbariums, including that of J. M. Moniz, are now deposited in the Kew Gardens and the British Museum. E.: *Notes on species of Lotws and Pedrosia*. (*Journ. of Botany*, 1897).
